title: Creating a Line Plot With Dual Axes
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create a line plot with dual axes using Matplotlib library in Python. We will plot two sets of data with different scales on the same graph. This is useful when we want to compare two related variables that have different units of measurement.

meta.title: Creating a Line Plot With Dual Axes
meta.description: Learn how to create a line plot with dual axes using Matplotlib in Python.
meta.keywords: dual axes, matplotlib, python, line plot, data visualization
